com.xith3d.loaders.ase
Class AseGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.xith3d.loaders.ase.AseNode
      com.xith3d.loaders.ase.AseGeom
          com.xith3d.loaders.ase.AseGroup
public class AseGroup
extends AseGeom

Object for the ASE node *GROUP. It is a collection of subgroups, child geom nodes and group attributes (stored in a helper object).

Author:
William Denniss

getShape

public Node getShape(AseFile file)
Returns a TransformGroup containing all child geometry and groups.

Overrides:
getShape in class AseGeom
Returns:

getNamedNodes

public void getNamedNodes(Hashtable namedNodes,
                          AseFile file)
Deprecated. Use either getModel to get the mesh or getTransformGroupTree to maintain the concept of groups and named nodes.

Recursivly adds the sub nodes of this group to the passed hashmap. Note the concept of the "group" is not maintained - all nodes are flat listed in the hashmap.

Overrides:
getNamedNodes in class AseGeom

getTransformGroup

public TransformGroup getTransformGroup(AseFile file,
                                        javax.vecmath.Vector3f pivotOffset)
Returns a TransformGroup containing the TransformGroups of all sub nodes (including groups).

Overrides:
getTransformGroup in class AseGeom
Parameters:
file - the parent AseFile
pivotOffset - vector that the geometry array will be offset by (this is NOT a translation but rather the actual values the array of geometry data will be offset by. This value is commonly the pivot point of the parent node
Returns:
a TransformGroup containing the geometry loaded relitive to the objects pivot point and translated into place.

createTransformGroupTree

public void createTransformGroupTree(TransformGroup tree,
                                     Map namedNodes,
                                     AseFile file,
                                     javax.vecmath.Vector3f pivotOffset,
                                     int flags)
Recursivly builds the TransformGroup Tree from the child nodes.

Overrides:
createTransformGroupTree in class AseGeom
Parameters:
tree - The current TransformGroup branch to which this Node will be added
namedNodes - map of the node names to their TransformGroup to which the created TransformGroup will be added
file - the parent AseFile
pivotOffset - the amount which the translation is offset by (this is usually the pivot point of the parent node)
flags - various options
See Also:
AseGeom#createTransformGroupTree(TransformGroup, java.util.Map, AseFile, Vector3f, boolean)

addGeometry

protected void addGeometry(TransformGroup branch,
                           Map namedNodes,
                           AseFile file,
                           javax.vecmath.Vector3f geomPivot,
                           int flags)
Recursivly adds the geometry associated with this node to the passed TransformGroup. The geometry is created relitive to this nodes pivot point.

Overrides:
addGeometry in class AseGeom
Parameters:
branch - the TransformGroup to which the geometry data for this node will be added.
See Also:
AseGeom#createTransformGroupTree(TransformGroup, java.util.Map, AseFile, Vector3f, boolean), AseGeom#addGeometry(TransformGroup, java.util.Map, AseFile, boolean)

getPivot

public javax.vecmath.Vector3f getPivot()
Returns this objects pivot point (in the Java3D coordinate space). This node is taken from the group's *HELPEROBJECT if present

Overrides:
getPivot in class AseGeom
Returns:
